settings.heading: Trusted Lab Testing, Right From Home.

settings.text: Finally, get the health answers you’ve been waiting for with our in-home lab testing. We offer quick, easy-to-read results that can be reviewed with our in-house physician.

settings.title: Choose Your Perfect Panel
settings.description: We offer a variety of custom panels to get the answers you need.

settings.title: Free Shipping
settings.text: Your blood collection kit is shipped free and includes a pre-paid shipping label so you can return it with ease.

settings.title: Physician-reviewed results
settings.text: Our in-house physicians will oversee your testing and are available to review your results with you and offer personalized recommendations.

settings.title: Discreet packaging and direct delivery
settings.text: Your privacy and security are our #1 priority. Both your sample kit and return box are discreetly labeled.

settings.title: Collect Your Sample
settings.text: A quick finger prick will collect the blood we need to determine your results.

settings.title: Mail it back
settings.text: Mail your sample back with our pre-paid shipping label. We offer discreet packaging so your privacy is always protected.

settings.title: Review your results
settings.text: After 7 Days, you’ll receive easy-to-read results and the option to review with one of our in-house physicians.

settings.heading: How long does it take to get results?
settings.row_content: You’ll receive an email from us within 7 days of your sample return with your results. At that time, you’ll receive the option to have a physician review these results with you and answer any questions you may have.

settings.heading: My state requires physician orders for tests like imaware's. Do you provide this for me?
settings.row_content: YES! Our in-house physician provides orders for every sample collected. You don’t need to worry about a prescription or any extra fees. It is already included in the purchase price!

settings.heading: Are imaware test results validated by a doctor?
settings.row_content: YES! Each test is shared with the physician who validated the order. This ensures your tests are validated.

settings.heading: Are results as accurate as a lab-based test?
settings.row_content: YES! Your labs are as accurate as traditional lab tests, but we’re actually the first at-home small volume blood testing company to have ourdata and methods peer reviewed by the scientific and medical community— which helps validate our claims and our results reports.Learn more about the exact science behind imaware tests.

settings.heading: Are my test results stored securely?
settings.row_content: Yes, your imaware account is secure. We have built leading-edge encryption and security features, and our digital health platform is HIPAA compliant. For more details about our privacy policy, pleaseclick here.
